title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Short-Intensive Course for Freshmen Adaptation and Self-Efficacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of university life and academic strategies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners complete academic tasks at over 80% proficiency by utilizing effective collaborative strategies with peers

Learners can establish a one-week learning plan for a software development project (topic: simple web application implementation) using university resources (library, learning center, online lecture platforms), achieve over 80% of the weekly checklist, and submit execution results in portfolio format.
Learners achieve short-term learning goals at over 90% proficiency by applying goal-setting and time management strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
